arts.ttl: FPL notes: Mbeumo’s pen, Esse impact + more Spurs injuries
arts.sum: Reaction from Palace v Brentford and Spurs v Leicester The post FPL notes: Mbeumo’s pen, Esse impact + more Spurs injuries appeared first on Best FPL Tips, Advice, Team News, Picks, and Statistics from Fantasy Football Scout.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou makes worrying Tottenham sack admission after hitting new low
arts.sum: Ambushed by lowly Leicester City, Leicester supporters turned on chairman Daniel Levy - but Ange Postecoglou admitted “a fair chunk” of people have run out of patience with him

arts.ttl: Leicester out of bottom three after comeback win at Spurs
arts.sum: Leicester City ended their seven-match losing run and moved out of the relegation zone with a 2-1 turnaround win to pile on the pressure for Tottenham Hotspur head coach Ange Postecoglou . Van Nistelrooy's team have seen their goal peppered with shots in recent matches, and only the efforts of Stolarczyk prevented Spurs from taking a more handsome lead into half-time.

arts.ttl: Tottenham vs Leicester: Confirmed Lineups, Team News and Score Prediction
arts.sum: Tottenham vs Leicester: Sunday 26th January 2025, 14:00 GMT Tottenham will look to turn their fortunes around when they face Leicester at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium today. Tottenham vs Leicest...
Match of the Day 2 pundits Thomas Hitzlsperger and Shay Given debate whether Tottenham should back manager Ange Postecoglou after their 2-1 Premier League home defeat to Leicester.

arts.ttl: Hits & misses: Man Utd problems still obvious and are Spurs boring?
arts.sum: Across their last 13 games Spurs are only averaging 1.3 expected goals per 90 and have struggled to break down the likes of Wolves, Ipswich and now Leicester. Four games in and West Ham are starting to show signs of life under Graham Potter.

arts.ttl: 'Turn your phone off' - Ange Postecoglou sent clear sack warning amid Tottenham relegation verdict - football.london
arts.sum: Ahead of United's clash with Fulham on TNT Sports, Ferdinand was asked whether Spurs were in a relegation battle and sadly for Postecoglou the response was damning. Former Manchester United defender Rio Ferdinand has advised Ange Postecoglou to turn his phone off after another defeat for Tottenham Hotspur on Sunday.

arts.ttl: Postecoglou: Spurs are 'united' and 'something special' is coming
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou says everyone at Tottenham Hotspur is "united" in what he and his coaching staff are trying to do despite the club being in their worst run of form for 17 years - saying "something special" can happen when Spurs' raft of injured players return to action. Premier League pundit Tim Sherwood, a former manager of Spurs, says Postecoglou is not the problem at the club and believes the head coach needs more support with quality signings.

arts.ttl: Jamie Vardy lands Celtic transfer pitch as Kyogo successor hunt goes beyond Kvistgaarden amid £4m alternative 'talks'
arts.sum: The outgoing Celtic striker has left a massive void in the Hoops' squad

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou reveals player he 'obviously' should NOT have played in shock defeat to Leicester - as Spurs injury crisis goes from bad to worse
arts.sum: Ange Postecoglou has revealed that he regrets starting a player who was not at full fitness as Tottenham succumbed to a shock defeat to Leicester in the Premier League.
